alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire; Southern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 17 at 2:34PM EDT until May 17 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR WESTERN MASSACHUSETTS AND NORTHWEST CONNECTICUT... * Affected Area...In Massachusetts, Berkshire County. In Connecticut, Litchfield County. * Timing...8 AM to 8 PM EDT today. * Winds...Northwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 20 percent. * Temperatures...In the mid 40s to upper 50s. * Lightning...None. * Impacts...Dry conditions and gusty winds may result in rapid fire spread if ignition occurs.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
